thread.title: Whats that space ship's licence plate?

post.author: ajm113
post.body: Whats that space ship's name that the marine goes on before that level where your on the turrent killing strogg the hole time? I don't have quake 4 at the moment right now, but also are their any images off it from top to side as well? I want to play around blender trying to make something close.

post.author: LinuxDoomer
post.body: USS Hannibal, that's the name of the ship that lands and the Operation: Advantage briefing takes place on board after you take out the air defense cannon at the beginning of the game.
